    • parseDeviceTouchInfoString

      private static DeviceTouchSearch.DeviceTouchDeviceInfo parseDeviceTouchInfoString​(java.lang.String deviceTouchInfoString)
      Function to parse the info string returned from a Paradigma SystaComfort The string looks like SC2 1 192.168.11.23 255.255.255.0 192.168.11.1 SystaComfort-II0 0809720001 0 V0.34 V1.00 2CBE9700BEE9
      Parameters:
      deviceTouchInfoString - the string received from the Paradigma SystaComfort
      Returns:
      the SCInfoString object parsed from the string
